parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: CmsGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the application group in CloudMonitor.

parameters.name: DeployRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the related sources reside.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the application group.

parameters.name: ImportTagKey
parameters.description: The key of the tag. You must set both the ImportTagKey and the ImportTagValue parameters, or leave both of them empty. If you do not set the ImportTagKey and ImportTagValue parameters, the application name is used for this parameter by default.

parameters.name: ImportTagValue
parameters.description: The value of the tag. You must set both the ImportTagKey and the ImportTagValue parameters, or leave both of them empty. If you do not set the ImportTagKey and ImportTagValue parameters, the application group name is used for this parameter by default.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the application group.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. Set the value to cn-hangzhou.
